name: arbor-aed
label: Arbor AED
description: Arbor AED secures the internet data center edge from threats against availability â€” specifically from application-layer, distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.

operations.title: Get Countries
operations.description: Retrieves the Arbor Networks AED country codes and names based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.name: sort_param
parameters.tooltip: Sort the countries retrieved by this operation by a key i.e., either country or name. By default, this is set to name.
parameters.description: Sort the countries retrieved by this operation by a key i.e., either country or name. By default, this is set to name.

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘+’ delimited countries name.
parameters.description: Specify the list of ‘+’ delimited country names based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Response Fields
parameters.name: select
parameters.placeholder: Eg. country,name or name or country
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited key
parameters.description: Specify the list of ‘+’ delimited keys that you want to in the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.tooltip: The direction in which results are sorted (ASC or DESC)
parameters.description: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say countries starting from the 10th country. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say countries starting from the 10th country. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Per Page
parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.tooltip: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.

operations.title: Create Inbound Protection Groups
operations.description: Creates an Arbor Networks AED protection group based on the protection group name, IP addresses, protection group server type, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Protection Group Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the protection group name that you want to create in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: Name of the protection group name that you want to create in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: IP Addresses or CIDRs
parameters.name: prefixes
parameters.description: List of ‘,’ delimited IP addresses or CIDRs belonging to the protection group that you want to create in Arbor AED. Note: Any IP Addresses or CIDRs that do not match the IP version of the specified protection group server type will be ignored.
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited IP Addresses or CIDRs belonging to the protection group. Any IP Addresses or CIDRs that do not match the IP version of the server type will be ignored.

parameters.title: Protection Group Server Type
parameters.name: serverType
parameters.description: Server type of the Arbor AED group in which you want to create the protection group.
parameters.tooltip: Server type of the Arbor AED group in which you want to create the protection group.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the protection group name that you want to create in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: Description of the protection group name that you want to create in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Protection Group Mode
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Select this checkbox to set the mode of the protection group that you want to create in Arbor AED to 'Active'.
parameters.tooltip: Select this checkbox to set the mode of the protection group that you want to create in Arbor AED to 'Active'.

parameters.title: Protection Level
parameters.name: protectionLevel
parameters.description: Protection level that you want to set for the protection group that you want to create in Arbor AED. You can choose from the following options: None = use the global protection level, 1 = Low (default), 2 = Medium, and 3 = High
parameters.tooltip: Protection level that you want to set for the protection group that you want to create in Arbor AED. You can choose from the following options: None = use the global protection level, 1 = Low (default), 2 = Medium, and 3 = High

operations.title: Get Inbound Protection Groups
operations.description: Retrieves all the inbound protection groups or specific inbound protection groups from the Arbor Networks AED protection groups based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Protection Group Identifier
parameters.name: pgid
parameters.description: Identifier of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: Identifier of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Protection Group Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: Name of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: Description of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Created Time
parameters.name: timeCreated
parameters.tooltip: Time of the creation of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED.
parameters.description: Time of the creation of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Protection Group Mode
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.
parameters.tooltip: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.

parameters.title: Protection Level
parameters.name: protectionLevel
parameters.description: Protection level, None, Low, Medium, or High of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: Protection level, None, Low, Medium, or High of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.tooltip: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending.
parameters.description: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Per Page
parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.tooltip: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.description: Other fields that you want to use to filter results returned by this operation. You can specify fields such as 'Search Criteria', which is used to determine dynamic membership or the 'Links' field defined JSON requests.
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Update Inbound Protection Groups
operations.description: Modifies the mode or the protection level for specific inbound protection groups based on the protection group IDs you have specified.

parameters.title: Protection Group IDs
parameters.name: pgid
parameters.tooltip: List of protection group IDs that you want to update in Arbor AED.
parameters.description: List of protection group IDs that you want to update in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Protection Group Mode
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.
parameters.tooltip: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Arbor AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.

parameters.title: Protection Level
parameters.name: protectionLevel
parameters.description: Protection level that you want to set for the protection group that you want to update in Arbor AED. You can choose from the following options: None = use the global protection level, 1 = Low (default), 2 = Medium, and 3 = High
parameters.tooltip: The protection level (None = use the global protection level, 1 = low, 2 = medium, 3 = high). Default: 1

operations.title: Add Inbound Blacklist Countries
operations.description: Adds one or more countries to the Arbor AED blacklist based on the country codes and protection group IDs (pgid) or central configuration IDs (cid) you have specified.

parameters.title: Country Code
parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO standardized country codes or a comma-separated list of country codes that you want to add to the blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: ISO standardized country codes or a comma-separated list of country codes that you want to add to the blacklist in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.
Protection Group ID.tooltip: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to add the country to the blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to add the country to the blacklist in Arbor AED.

operations.title: Get Inbound Blacklisted Countries
operations.description: Retrieves all the inbound blacklisted countries or specific inbound blacklisted countries based on the input parameters you have specified. By default, 10 blacklisted countries are returned. To return blacklisted countries for specific protection groups, specify a list of protection group IDs or central configuration IDs. An ID of -1 selects countries that are globally blacklisted.

parameters.title: Country Code
parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO standardized country codes or a comma-separated list of country codes that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: ISO standardized country codes or a comma-separated list of country codes that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited central configuration IDs. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited protection group IDs. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to retrieve the countries that are part of the blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to retrieve the countries that are part of the blacklist in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Update Time
parameters.name: updateTime
parameters.description: Last updated or set time for the countries that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Arbor AED
parameters.tooltip: Last updated or set time for the countries that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Arbor AED

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.name: sort_param
parameters.tooltip: Key used to sort the countries retrieved by this operation.
parameters.description: Key used to sort the countries retrieved by this operation.

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘+’ delimited key values based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.
parameters.description: List of ‘+’ delimited key values based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Response Fields
parameters.name: select
parameters.placeholder: Eg. country,updateTime,cid or name or country etc.
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited keys that you want to include in the results of this operation.
parameters.description: List of ‘,’ delimited keys that you want to include in the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.tooltip: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. By default, this page will be sorted in the 'Ascending' order of country code.
parameters.description: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. By default, this page will be sorted in the 'Ascending' order of country code.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Per Page
parameters.name: perPage
parameters.tooltip: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10
parameters.description: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10

operations.title: Remove Inbound Blacklisted Countries
operations.description: Removes one or more countries from the Arbor AED blacklist for a specific protection group or for all protection groups based on the country codes and protection group IDs (pgid) or central configuration IDs (cid) you have specified.

parameters.title: Country
parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO standardized country codes or a comma-separated list of country codes that you want to remove from the blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: ISO standardized country codes or a comma-separated list of country codes that you want to remove from the blacklist in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter
Protection Group ID.tooltip: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID (cid) or Protection Group ID (pgid) based on which you want to remove the country from the blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID (cid) or Protection Group ID (pgid) based on which you want to remove the country from the blacklist in Arbor AED.

operations.title: Add Inbound Whitelisted Hosts
operations.description: Adds one or more hosts to the Arbor AED whitelist based on the host addresses or CIDRs and protection group IDs (pgid) or central configuration IDs (cid).

parameters.title: Host Address
parameters.name: hostAddress
parameters.description: A single IPv4 or IPv6 host address or CIDR or a comma-separated list of host addresses or CIDRs that you want to add to the whitelist in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: A single IPv4 or IPv6 host address or CIDR or a comma-separated list of host addresses or CIDRs that you want to add to the whitelist in Arbor AED.

Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

operations.title: Get Inbound Whitelisted Hosts
operations.description: Retrieves all the inbound whitelisted hosts or specific inbound whitelisted hosts based on the input parameters you have specified. By default, all whitelisted hosts are returned. To return whitelisted hosts for specific protection groups, specify a list of protection group IDs or central configuration IDs. An ID of -1 selects hosts that are globally whitelisted.

parameters.title: Host Address
parameters.name: hostAddress
parameters.description: List of ‘,’ delimited IPv4 host addresses or CIDRs that you want to retrieve from the inbound whitelist in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited IPv4 host addresses or CIDRs that you want to retrieve from the inbound whitelist in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: List of ‘,’ delimited central configuration IDs. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited central configuration IDs. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: List of ‘,’ delimited protection group IDs. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.
Protection Group ID.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited protection group IDs. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to retrieve the hosts that are part of the whitelist in Arbor AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to retrieve the hosts that are part of the whitelist in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Update Time
parameters.name: updateTime
parameters.description: Last updated or set time for the hosts that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: Last updated or set time for the hosts that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.name: sort_param
parameters.tooltip: Key used to sort the domains retrieved by this operation.
parameters.description: Key used to sort the domains retrieved by this operation.

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘+’ delimited key values based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.
parameters.description: List of ‘+’ delimited key values based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Response Fields
parameters.name: select
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited keys that you want to include in the results of this operation.
parameters.description: List of ‘,’ delimited keys that you want to include in the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending.
parameters.tooltip: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Per Page
parameters.name: perPage
parameters.tooltip: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.description: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.

operations.title: Remove Inbound Whitelisted Hosts
operations.description: Removes one or more hosts or CIDRs from the Arbor AED whitelist for a specific protection group or for all protection groups based on the host addresses or CIDRs and protection group IDs (pgid) or central configuration IDs (cid) you have specified.

parameters.title: Host Address
parameters.name: hostAddress
parameters.description: A single IPv4 or IPv6 host address or CIDR or a comma-separated list of host addresses or CIDRs that you want to remove from the whitelist in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: A single IPv4 or IPv6 host address or CIDR or a comma-separated list of host addresses or CIDRs that you want to remove from the whitelist in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter
Protection Group ID.tooltip: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to remove the hosts from the whitelist in Arbor AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to remove the hosts from the whitelist in Arbor AED.

operations.title: Add Inbound Blacklist URLs
operations.description: Adds one or more URLs to the Arbor AED blacklist based on the URL and protection group IDs (pgid) or central configuration IDs (cid) you have specified.

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: url
parameters.tooltip: URL or a comma-separated list of URLs that you want to add to the blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.description: URL or a comma-separated list of URLs that you want to add to the blacklist in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.
Protection Group ID.tooltip: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to add the URL(s) to the blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to add the URL(s) to the blacklist in Arbor AED.

operations.title: Get Inbound Blacklisted URLs
operations.description: Retrieves all the inbound blacklisted URLs or specific inbound blacklisted URLs based on the input parameters you have specified. To return blacklisted URLs for specific protection groups, specify a list of protection group IDs or central configuration IDs. An ID of -1 selects URLs that are globally blacklisted.

parameters.title: URL
parameters.name: url
parameters.description: List of ‘,’ delimited URLs that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited URLs that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Arbor AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: List of ‘,’ delimited protection group IDs. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.
Protection Group ID.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited protection group IDs. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.

parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to retrieve the URLs that are part of the blacklist in Arbor AED.

operations.title: Add Outbound Blacklist Hosts
operations.description: Adds one or more hosts to the Arbor AED outbound blacklist based on the host addresses or CIDRs you have specified.

parameters.title: Host Address
parameters.name: hostAddress
parameters.description: A single IPv4 or IPv6 host address or CIDR or a comma-separated list of host addresses or CIDRs that you want to add to the outbound blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: A single IPv4 or IPv6 host address or CIDR or a comma-separated list of host addresses or CIDRs that you want to add to the outbound blacklist in Arbor AED.

operations.title: Get Outbound Blacklisted Hosts
operations.description: Retrieves all the outbound blacklisted hosts or specific outbound blacklisted hosts based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Host Address
parameters.name: hostAddress
parameters.description: List of ',' delimited IPv4 host addresses or CIDRs that you want to retrieve from the outbound blacklist in Arbor AED.
parameters.tooltip: List of ',' delimited IPv4 host addresses or CIDRs that you want to retrieve from the outbound blacklist in Arbor AED.

parameters.description: List of ‘,’ delimited keys that you want to include in the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.name: sort_param
parameters.tooltip: Sort the hosts retrieved by this operation by a key i.e., either Host Address or Update Time. By default, this is set to Host Address.
parameters.description: Sort the hosts retrieved by this operation by a key i.e., either Host Address or Update Time. By default, this is set to Host Address.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending.
parameters.tooltip: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending.
